Name: Cold Blooded
Ingredients: 45 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°Brix)
Instructions: MUDDLE rosemary in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice & fine strain into ice-filled glass.
History: Adapted from a drink discovered in 2008 on Steve Olson's akawinegeek.com site.
